titleStmt.title: A new discovery of the French disease and running of the reins their causes, signs, with plain and easie direction of perfect curing the same. By R. Bunworth,
titleStmt.author: Bunworth, Richard.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected with large additionals.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Marsh at the Princes-Arms in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Royal College of Physicians Library, London.
